QuestData.Title: Into the Unknown
QuestData.Description: Come to pay old Marasmius a visit? I have a special task for you.$b$bOne of my shoots has found a strange place, a place even I've never seen before.$b$bI'm not entirely sure what's in there or if it's even safe. But that's what my trusty mushroomancers are for!$b$BWhat do you say, $n? Up for an adventure?
QuestData.RewardText: That was close. Those pests can quickly blast away whole chunks of Ardenweald if we aren't careful. We've got enough problems on our hands as it is!
